verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}’Tis the Church triumphant singing, Worthy the Lamb; Heav’n throughout with praises ringing, Worthy the Lamb. Thrones and pow’rs before Him bending, Odors sweet with voice ascending Swell the chorus never ending, Worthy the Lamb.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Every kindred, tongue and nation, Worthy the Lamb; Join to sing the great salvation, Worthy the Lamb. Loud as mighty thunders roaring, Floods of mighty waters pouring, Prostrate at His feet adoring, Worthy the Lamb.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing with blest anticipation Worthy the Lamb; Through the vale of tribulation, Worthy the Lamb. Sweetest notes, all notes excelling, On the theme forever dwelling, Still untold, though ever telling, Worthy the Lamb.{/lang-eng}
